FuncDef: This command removes the accumulated statistics for a subscriber.

ParaDef.Info: Removes the accumulated statistics that are no longer associated with an accu-stats-policy. These are active subscribers that are referencing a subscriber profile that removed an accu-stats-policy.
Removes the accumulated statistics for the specified subscriber profile.
Removes the accumulated statistics from all inactive subscribers.
Specifies the subscriber profile up to 32 characters.
Specifies the subscriber up to 32 characters.
